question: Build a bridge between 고급 자동화 조작 AnimationSetup and Godot systems.
answer:
This addon will provide a bridge between the Advanced Automation Setup (AAS) and the Godot 3D engine.

## Features

- Import AAS scriptures into Godot
- Convert AAS scriptures into Godot nodes
- Provide a bridge between AAS scriptures and Godot nodes
- Provide a bridge between AAS and Godot systems

## Installation

This addon is not yet ready for installation. It's in the early stages of development and not ready for production use.

## Usage

The usage of this addon is not yet documented. It's in the early stages of development and not ready for production use.

## Contributing

Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.

[MIT](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/)

## Acknowledgement

This project is a part of the Advanced Automation Setup (AAS) project. The AAS project is a research project focused on advanced automation techniques and technologies. The AAS project is supported by the National Science Foundation (NSF) under Grant No. IIS-1720732.

## Disclaimer

This project is in the experimental phase and is not yet ready for production
